review: Apple's remote for the Apple TV is pure genius.  It could not feel better in the hand and it is so simplistic it is otherworldly.  Too bad the Apple tv itself made me want to pull my hair out!  My main goal was to stream movies from my PC to my Apple tv unit wirelessly.  After 2 weeks of trying by way of Apple Customer service reps who could not figure it out and a best friend who loves his Apple TV, I had to give up.  It never worked!  I bought a Roku instead, and it worked immediately out of the box.  Sold!
